abstract: Federal Judge David L Bunning in Kentucky denies Rowan County Clerk Kim Davis a stay of his order requiring her office to issue marriage licenses to all eligible couples; Davis requested hold while she appeals order.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday denied Ms. Davis a stay of his order requiring her office to issue marriage licenses to all eligible couples.

headline.main: Kentucky: Rowan County Clerk Kim Davis Is Again Rebuffed on Licenses
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Clerk Is Again Rebuffed on Licenses

snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday denied Ms. Davis a stay of his order requiring her office to issue marriage licenses to all eligible couples.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
